title: All Ball - Pt. 2 Former Hofstra Star Charles Jenkins on NBA Rookie Year, Steph Curry Bond, Monta Ellis Trade, Overseas Life
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 2 Former Hofstra Star Charles Jenkins on NBA Rookie Year, Steph Curry Bond, Monta Ellis Trade, Overseas Life
description:
Doug sits down for part 2 of his interview with former Hofstra star Charles Jenkins to discuss his rookie year with the Warriors, his first interactions with a rookie Steph Curry, how he stayed ready despite limited action, how the unexpected Monta Ellis trade opened up playing time led to huge PT, and how his surprising trade to Philly taught him a hard lesson about NBA reality, Then, he discusses the transition to playing overseas, his tales from life on and off the court during a successful career in Serbia, Italy, Greece and Spain, and what it was like playing during extreme COVID lockdown. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
